overview: Carlo Koelzer is a founding partner and a member of the executive board. He started his investment banking career as a financial analyst for Hess & Co., New York, in the field of mergers & acquisitions and block trading. Later, Carlo worked for Dresdner Kleinwort Benson in Frankfurt and New York. He has extensive in-depth process knowledge of Capital Markets notably Global Markets, Global Equities, Trading, Sales, Risk Control and Financial Accounting. Prior to founding 360T, Carlo headed a task force within the Internal Audit Group of Dresdner Kleinwort Benson.
